# 떡볶이

Created: Jan 16, 2021 9:34 PM English: ricecake Hasgtag: korean, spicy Korean: 떡볶이 Last made: Jan 17, 2021 Rating: 9 Swedish: riskaka

Tteokbokki rice cake 2cup 0.5 cups green onions

1.5 T red pepper powder Gochujang 1T Sugar 3T Soy sauce 2.5T Honey 2T Starch syrup 2T Fish Sauce 1T
